mapper.insert: insert into dic_provider ( providerName, addr, phone , linkman, finance, bank , wb, py, enabled ) values ( #{providerName}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{linkman}, #{finance}, #{bank}, #{wb}, #{py}, #{enabled} )
mapper.update: update dic_provider set providerName = #{providerName}, addr = #{addr}, phone = #{phone}, linkman = #{linkman}, finance = #{finance}, bank = #{bank}, wb = #{wb}, py = #{py}, enabled = #{enabled} where id = #{id}
update dic_provider set enabled = #{status} where id = #{id}
